scripts.build: yarn build:api && yarn build:plugins && yarn copy-files
scripts.copy-files: yarn copy-default-workspace-plugin && yarn copy-zephyr41-single-core-blinky && yarn copy-zephyr41-project-plugin && yarn copy-msdk-project-plugin && yarn copy-registers-project-plugin && yarn copy-msdk-single-core-hello-world && yarn copy-msdk-multi-core-hello-world && shx cp -r plugins/common/utilities plugins/dist/common
scripts.copy-default-workspace-plugin: shx mkdir -p plugins/dist/default-workspace-plugin && shx cp -r plugins/default-workspace-plugin/templates plugins/dist/default-workspace-plugin && shx cp plugins/default-workspace-plugin/.cfsplugin plugins/dist/default-workspace-plugin/
scripts.copy-zephyr41-single-core-blinky: shx mkdir -p plugins/dist/zephyr41-single-core-blinky && shx cp -r plugins/zephyr41-single-core-blinky/files plugins/zephyr41-single-core-blinky/templates plugins/dist/zephyr41-single-core-blinky/ && shx cp plugins/zephyr41-single-core-blinky/.cfsplugin plugins/dist/zephyr41-single-core-blinky/
scripts.copy-zephyr41-project-plugin: shx mkdir -p plugins/dist/zephyr41-project-plugin && shx cp -r plugins/zephyr41-project-plugin/files plugins/zephyr41-project-plugin/templates plugins/zephyr41-project-plugin/codegen plugins/zephyr41-project-plugin/config-patches plugins/dist/zephyr41-project-plugin && shx cp plugins/zephyr41-project-plugin/.cfsplugin plugins/dist/zephyr41-project-plugin/
scripts.copy-msdk-project-plugin: shx mkdir -p plugins/dist/msdk-project-plugin && shx cp -r plugins/msdk-project-plugin/files plugins/msdk-project-plugin/templates plugins/dist/msdk-project-plugin && shx cp -r plugins/msdk-project-plugin/config-patches plugins/dist/msdk-project-plugin && shx cp plugins/msdk-project-plugin/.cfsplugin plugins/dist/msdk-project-plugin/ && shx cp -r plugins/msdk-project-plugin/files plugins/dist/msdk-project-plugin
scripts.copy-registers-project-plugin: shx mkdir -p plugins/dist/registers-project-plugin && shx cp -r plugins/registers-project-plugin/templates plugins/dist/registers-project-plugin && shx cp -r plugins/registers-project-plugin/config-patches plugins/dist/registers-project-plugin && shx cp plugins/registers-project-plugin/.cfsplugin plugins/dist/registers-project-plugin/
scripts.copy-msdk-single-core-hello-world: shx mkdir -p plugins/dist/msdk-single-core-hello-world && shx cp -r plugins/msdk-single-core-hello-world/files plugins/msdk-single-core-hello-world/templates plugins/dist/msdk-single-core-hello-world && shx cp plugins/msdk-single-core-hello-world/.cfsplugin plugins/dist/msdk-single-core-hello-world/
scripts.copy-msdk-multi-core-hello-world: shx mkdir -p plugins/dist/msdk-multi-core-hello-world && shx cp -r plugins/msdk-multi-core-hello-world/files plugins/msdk-multi-core-hello-world/templates plugins/dist/msdk-multi-core-hello-world && shx cp plugins/msdk-multi-core-hello-world/.cfsplugin plugins/dist/msdk-multi-core-hello-world/
